content.eamr: ( ing-1 "1 (16 ounce) can whole cranberry sauce" )

content.text: 1 recipe pastry for a 9 inch double crust pie
content.eamr: ( ing-6 "1 recipe pastry for a 9 inch double crust pie" )

content.text: 0) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Preheat"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( tool-0-0 "oven"@11:15 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "350 degrees F"@19:32 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-0-1 "175 degrees C"@34:47 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Line a pie plate with pastry.
2) Peel, core, and slice the apples.
3) Combine apples and cranberry sauce in a medium-sized mixing bowl.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "Combine"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( "apples"@11:17 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "cranberry sauce"@22:37 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-3-0 "a medium-sized mixing bowl"@41:67 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Combine brown sugar, flour, cinnamon, and nutmeg; add to the apple mixture.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "Combine"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-2 "brown sugar"@11:22 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "flour"@24:29 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "cinnamon"@31:39 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "nutmeg"@45:51 / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-4-1 "add"@53:56 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:gol ( "the apple mixture"@60:77 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 6) Turn filling into the pastry lined pan.
10) Bake for 1 hour, or until the crust is golden brown and the filling bubbly.
